nodes.text: Star Wars: The Phantom Menace: The Expanded Visual Dictionary

Star Wars: The Phantom Menace: The Expanded Visual Dictionary is the tenth book in the Star Wars Visual Dictionaries series and the successor to the original Star Wars: Episode I The Visual Dictionary from 1999. The Expanded Visual Dictionary was written by David West Reynolds and Jason Fry, and published by DK Publishing on January 16, 2012, to coincide with the 3-D theatrical release of the film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
